ome.smuggler.core.service.mail

Interface MailProcessor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RepeatConsumer<QueuedMail>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Mailer

    public interface MailProcessor
extends RepeatConsumer<QueuedMail>
    Carries out a request to send an email. It consumes a mail request that was fetched from the mail queue and returns Repeat if the sending of the email failed because of a transient error condition and it should be retried or Stop if the sending should not be retried because it succeeded or it failed but it's not possible to recover.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface ome.smuggler.core.msg.RepeatConsumer

        consume
